thread.title: Dan McKeown
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Dan McKeown

author: Dan McKeown
title: Dan McKeown
text:
I wish I had heard of Solar Quote: s before I spent time fending off salesmen who had enough banter to create smoke and mirrors.
Finally asked Google, how do I find useful solar Quote: s. There you were.
Unfortunately my colleague who had been bombarded also , when Nicole from MC Electrics came and I did due diligence on the company ( essential to do ABN and ACCC checks., we were so impresses, we bought 2 phases of 6KW . Only trouble is I had to put off the other 2 companies who were possibly as good as MC. Great service, I praise your site and recommendations. dan
